title: legacy MM.py index error
body_html:
Hi I think that in
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/legacy/nn/MM.py

lines 28 and 30:

if self.transA: a = a.transpose(2, 3) if self.transB: b = b.transpose(2, 3)

should be:

if self.transA: a = a.transpose(1, 2) if self.transB: b = b.transpose(1, 2)

Indeed in that branch the tensor has 3 dimension and thus the code crashes.
Maybe an indexing error when translating from lua ?
Thank you very much,
body_text:

should be:

Indeed in that branch the tensor has 3 dimension and thus the code crashes.
Maybe an indexing error when translating from lua ?
Thank you very much,
body:
Hi I think that in 
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/legacy/nn/MM.py

lines 28 and 30:

`if self.transA:
                a = a.transpose(2, 3)
            if self.transB:
                b = b.transpose(2, 3)`

should be:

`if self.transA:
                a = a.transpose(1, 2)
            if self.transB:
                b = b.transpose(1, 2)`

Indeed in that branch the tensor has 3 dimension and thus the code crashes.
Maybe an indexing error when translating from lua ?
Thank you very much,
